experience.exp-description-0: Collaborated on the development of the Rave Dates events platform (Colombia), building role-based views, authentication, payment gateways, and complex API integrations. Delivered pixel-perfect implementations from Figma with 100% typed TypeScript.
experience.exp-description-1: I worked as a Frontend Developer at TPEOficial, a startup delivering software services and AI tools. My role includes frontend development, email creation, and contributing creative ideas, alongside a collaborative team with strong communication.
experience.exp-description-2: As a Freelance Frontend Developer, I have built applications and websites for various clients, developing booking systems, e-commerce platforms, and admin dashboards using React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and Firebase, improving processes and enhancing the digital experience for businesses.
